title: Vegetarian tomato stew
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 onion, coarsely chopped', '2 garlic cloves, minced', 'salt to taste', '1 stick celery, thinly sliced', '1 leek, thinly sliced', '5 medium tomatoes, coarsely chopped', '500ml vegetable stock', '1 carrot, sliced', '5 fingerling potatoes, sliced', '100g macaroni pasta', '1 handful fresh spinach leaves', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'ground nutmeg to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', 'Parmesan cheese, to taste']
